articles.title: Nord Stream 1: Gas pipeline shuts down for maintenance - CTV News
articles.description: A major gas pipeline from Russia to western Europe shut down for annual maintenance on Monday amid concern in Germany that Russia may not resume the flow of gas as scheduled.
articles.content:

articles.title: Weather in Ireland to get progressively warmer as heat plume moves over northern Europe - The Irish Times
articles.description: Monday could be the hottest day of the year to date with hot weather set to return next weekend

articles.title: Ukraine criticizes Canada over return of turbines for Russia-Germany pipeline - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: The Ukrainian government is calling on Canada to reconsider its decision to allow the delivery of turbines from a Russia-Europe natural gas pipeline to Germany, saying it sets a "dangerous precedent" when it comes to sanctions against the Russian regime.
